author: cnbc.com
title: Emerson Declares Dividend
text:
ST. LOUIS--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- The board of directors of Emerson (NYSE: EMR) today declared the regular quarterly cash dividend of forty-eight and a half cents ($0.485) per share of common stock payable March 9, 2018 to stockholders of record February 16, 2018.
View source version on businesswire.com : http://www.businesswire.com/news/home/20180206005888/en/
For Emerson
Mark Polzin, 314-982-1758
Source: Emerson
